ruling: - Tributing 1 Fairy-Type monster, except [[Athena]], is a cost to activate [[Athena]]'s Ignition Effect.
- [[Athena]]'s second effect targets 1 Fairy-Type monster in your Graveyard.
- [[Athena]]'s first effect does not inflict damage when it is Summoned.

- If multiple Fairy-Type monsters are Special Summoned by the same effect, [[Athena]] inflicts 600 damage to the opponent's Life Points. If 2 or more effects on the Chain Special Summon a Fairy-Type monster, [[Athena]]'s effect will inflict 600 damage for each effect.
